DataLoader¶

class DataLoader(inputs, targets, batch_size=32, shuffle=True)¶

Bases: bluebird.dataloader.dataloaderbase.DataLoaderBase

__init__(inputs, targets, batch_size=32, shuffle=True)¶

Initalizes the object.

Parameters

  • inputs (Tensor) – inputs (data that passes throughout the network)

  • targets (Tensor) – target data

  • batch_size (int) – length of every batch size, defaults to 32

  • shuffle (bool) – shuffles data if true, defaults to True

Methods

__init__(inputs, targets[, batch_size, shuffle])

Initalizes the object.
